CONTACT.HEADLINE: Let's build something Cool together!
CONTACT.INTRO: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_TEXT: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data.

ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT_ME.INTRO: Hey there, I'm Gary. Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? What is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills?  Do you learn from each challenge as you search for the most efficient or elegant solution? Let's connect and create something amazing together!
ABOUT_ME.CONNECT: Let's connect and create something amazing together!

REFERENCES.HEADLINE: What my colleagues say about me

KENKLEIN.NAME: Kenneth M. Klein
KENKLEIN.TEXT: It is very rare to have in one person such a complete skill set. He was an extremely dedicated employee who was always thinking about his projects and coming up with improvements -- even outside of office hours. His excitement was contagious!

PAULHOLCOMB.NAME: Paul Holcomb
PAULHOLCOMB.TEXT: Gary did the “heavy lifting” on the programming side on projects for Universal Orlando and an internal project called Wayzon. I would recommend Gary to anyone looking for a highly adept programmer.
PAULHOLCOMB.ROLE: Director, New Media Investment Group LLC

ALICIAMENDA.NAME: Alicia Menda
ALICIAMENDA.TEXT: He is valuable from a creative and from a developer stand point. Also he is always determined to complete projects regardless of the challenges that may be present

STEVENMILLER.NAME: Steven Miller
STEVENMILLER.TEXT: He is a multi-talented individual and would bring many benefits to any team, whether it's his programming skills, art, creativity or thinking outside the box to resolve complex issues. He has a unique determination to get to the root causes of problems and resolve them in the most efficient way.

KYEPARK.NAME: Kye Park
KYEPARK.TEXT: I know that his programming skills are superior because there weren't any modifications he couldn't do, and his final projects were always better than our expectations

SKILLS.HEADLINE: Core Competencies
SKILLS.INTRO: Emphasise that you have used a variety of front-end technologies in your projects. Where have you used these skills: static or dynamic websites, responsive layouts, data visualization interfaces, smooth user experiences?

PORTFOLIO.HEADLINE: My Work
PORTFOLIO.INTRO: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with the projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESC: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

DABUBBLE.TITLE: DABubble
DABUBBLE.DESC: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

CRABTROPICS.TITLE: Crab Tropics
CRABTROPICS.DESC: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Kit to find coins and catnip to fight against the killer Sea Turtle.

COVENULM.TITLE: CoveN Ulm
COVENULM.DESC: An immersive horror experience in Ulm featuring live shows, themed events, and eerie attractions designed for true horror fans. Presented by CoveN Ulm.

CHRONOGLOBE.TITLE: ChronoGlobe
CHRONOGLOBE.DESC: An interactive globe app that lets you explore world maps of countries and empires for every year in history.

WOOIMPORTEXPORT.TITLE: WooCommerce Custom Import / Export
WOOIMPORTEXPORT.DESC: WooCommerce comes with limted data import and export capabilities. Fortunately, it is extendable.

OKINAWARUSH.TITLE: Okinawa Rush
OKINAWARUSH.DESC: Ein Multiplayer-Kampf-Plattformer für Switch, PS4, Xbox, PC, Mac und Linux.WooCommerce kommt mit eingeschränkten Datenimport- und Exportmöglichkeiten. Glücklicherweise ist es erweiterbar.
